item.description:
Looks like Thursday June 4th is the date for our first meeting!
For the first meeting I'll pick a theme and choose approximately 6 white wines to taste.

Could a couple of people volunteer to bring appetizers?
Just something simple like cheese and crackers and maybe a hot appetizers that would pair with white wines.

I'll post the cost estimate the day before the meeting.

Agenda
o Greeting wine
o Discuss meetup group- what to taste, when to taste, where to meet, etc
o Educational topic
o Mystery wine
o Socialize and more discussions.

Please email me with any concerns or questions.

Thanks,
Mike

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: June Meeting- 1st Meeting
